testcase.name: HomeController GET should render the index page from a new instance of controller

failure.message:
org.scalatest.exceptions.TestFailedException: " This is a Play Scala API demo

This is a Play Scala API Demo

A demo project based off the Building a RESTful API with Scala and Play tutorial.

This project is deployed via Heroku.

API Documentation

URL HTTP Method Required Header Body
/api GET None N/A
/api POST Content-Type: application/json "_id" : String
"name" : String
"description" : String
"numSales" : Int
/api/:id GET None N/A
/api/:id PUT Content-Type: application/json "_id" : String
"name" : String
"description" : String
"numSales" : Int
/api/:id DELETE Content-Type: application/json N/A
" did not include substring "Welcome to Play"
